original_title: 浣腸魔 復讐の肛悶絶折檻
overview: Shiratama, a serial enema demon, is currently missing. His younger brother Takashima, who is in trouble, is pitifully begging Shirayama's daughter Misato for money. One day, Takashima sees Alice on the street, whom he fell in love with when he was a student. Takashima, who followed Alice, finds out that she is the owner of a high-end beauty salon and reports it to her Minori.
title: Enema Demon Revenge Anal Agony
